privacy-one-content:
Our Privacy Policy was updated on 15th October, 2023. 

Please take a moment to familiarize yourself with our privacy practices and let us know if you have any questions.
privacy-two-content:
Tesoro Store Private Limited (hereinafter refer to as “Tesoro”, “we”, “our” or “us”) takes your privacy very seriously. This Privacy Policy is designed with your needs in mind, and it is important that you have a comprehensive understanding of our personal information collection and usage practices, while ensuring that ultimately, you have control of your personal information provided to Tesoro.

 

About this Privacy Policy

This Privacy Policy applies to all Tesoro websites or applications that reference or link to this Privacy Policy. This Privacy Policy explains how Tesoro collects, uses, discloses, processes, and protects any personal information that you give us or that we collect from you, when you use our products and services located at websites (www.tesorostore.in), and our applications (if any) that we offer on our mobile devices. 

Under this Privacy Policy, “personal information” means and includes sensitive personal data or information and all information that relates to and can be used to directly or indirectly identify an individual, either from that information alone or from that information combined with other information Tesoro has access to about that individual, except as otherwise specifically provided by applicable laws in your region. 

“Sensitive personal data or information” of a person includes such personal information which consists of information relating to:

  • password;
  • financial information such as bank account or credit card or debit card or other payment instrument details;
  • physical, physiological and mental health condition;
  • sexual orientation;
  • medical records and history;
  • biometric information;
  • any detail relating to the above clauses as provided to Tesoro for providing services; and
  • any of the information received under any of the above clauses by Tesoro for processing, stored or processed under lawful contract or otherwise.

We will use your personal information strictly in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

 

How we can help you

Ultimately, what we want is the best for all our users. Should you have any questions with our data handling practices as summarized in this Privacy Policy, please contact support@tesorostore.in to address your specific concerns. We will be happy to hear from you. If you have an unresolved privacy or data use concern that we have not addressed satisfactorily, please contact _admin@tesorostore.in_, free of charge
